services.title: AI Ethics Consulting
services.description: Comprehensive evaluation and implementation of ethical AI frameworks for organizations developing machine learning systems.

services.title: Privacy-Preserving ML Implementation
services.description: Design and implementation of machine learning systems that protect user privacy while maintaining model performance.

services.title: Research Collaboration
services.description: Partner with academic institutions and industry teams on cutting-edge AI research projects and publications.

services.title: Technical Training & Workshops
services.description: Educational programs on AI ethics, privacy-preserving ML, and responsible AI development for teams and organizations.

services.title: Full-Stack Development
services.description: End-to-end web application development with modern technologies and best practices for scalable, secure solutions.

services.title: AI System Auditing
services.description: Comprehensive evaluation of existing AI systems for bias, fairness, privacy compliance, and ethical considerations.

testimonials.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
testimonials.title: Director of AI Research
testimonials.content: Thomas's expertise in AI ethics helped us implement responsible AI practices across our entire organization. His practical approach and deep knowledge made the transition seamless.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.title: CTO
testimonials.content: The privacy-preserving ML solution Thomas developed for us exceeded expectations. We maintained model accuracy while ensuring complete user privacy compliance.

testimonials.name: Prof. Emily Rodriguez
testimonials.title: Department Head
testimonials.content: Our collaboration with Thomas resulted in three high-impact publications. His research insights and technical skills are exceptional.

process.title: Discovery & Assessment
process.description: Initial consultation to understand your needs, challenges, and objectives.

process.title: Proposal & Planning
process.description: Detailed project proposal with timeline, deliverables, and success metrics.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: Collaborative development and implementation with regular progress updates.

process.title: Testing & Validation
process.description: Comprehensive testing, validation, and performance evaluation.

process.title: Delivery & Support
process.description: Final delivery with documentation and ongoing support as needed.
